text: Blenio is a district of the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. The capital city of the district is Acquarossa. == Circles and municipalities == * Circle of Malvaglia: Malvaglia, Semione, Ludiano; * Circle of di Acquarossa: Castro, Corzoneso, Dongio, Grumo, Largario, Leontica, Lottigna, Ponto Valentino, Prugiasco, Torre; * Circle of Olivone: Aquila, Bottino, Campo (Blenio), Ghirone, Olivone. Category:Blenio District
title: Blenio District
